review_blob:
Well, ive tasted a lot of lemon/citrus beers, and being Danish means of course them from Carlsberg too. But this super fresh Romanian Premium Ciuc Lemon Radler is simply the best ive tasted, in other words then i was love from first zip/taste. The fresh flavour is moderate combi to the sweets, with a very nice duration, syrupy, lime, grape notes. MUST be served and drinked cold, and fits any warm summerday, or in generel actually because its never too sour (like others) 

Im a graphic artist myself, and the branding/colors/fonts is spot on too!

BIG positive recommendations from me 

/ Peter
